info.description: Documentation for the Unmanic application API
info.title: Unmanic API

content.description: Document contents read line-by-line into a list

traceback.description: Attached exception traceback (if developer mode is enabled)
example:
Traceback (most recent call last):
json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 3 column 14 (char 45)

traceback.description: Attached exception traceback (if developer mode is enabled)
example:
Traceback (most recent call last):
json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 3 column 14 (char 45)

directories.description: A list of directories in the given path

files.description: A list of files in the given path

start.description: Start row number to select from

search_value.description: String to filter search results by
search_value.example: items with this text in the value

recordsTotal.description: Total number of records in this table

recordsFiltered.description: Total number of records after filters have been applied

successCount.description: Total count of times with a success status in the results list

failedCount.description: Total count of times with a failed status in the results list

success.description: This is always "True" when a request succeeds

command_log_lines.description: The long string broken up into an array of lines

start.description: Start row number to select from

search_value.description: String to filter search results by
search_value.example: items with this text in the value

type.description: The type of the pending task - local or remote

status.description: The current status of the pending task

library_id.description: The ID of the library for which this task was created

library_name.description: The name of the library for which this task was created

recordsTotal.description: Total number of records in this table

recordsFiltered.description: Total number of records after filters have been applied

position.description: Position to move given list of items to ('top' or 'bottom')

path.description: The absolute path to a file

library_id.description: The ID of the library to append this task to

library_name.description: The name of the library to append this task to

type.description: The type of pending task to create (local/remote)

priority_score.description: Apply a priority score to the created task to either increase or decrease its position in the queue

link_id.description: The ID used to download the file /unmanic/downloads/{link_id}

start.description: Start row number to select from

search_value.description: String to filter search results by
search_value.example: items with this text in the value

update_available.description: Does the plugin have an update available

description.example: Ensure all video streams are encoded with the H264 codec using the h264_nvenc encoder.

has_config.description: The plugin has the ability to be configured

recordsTotal.description: Total number of records in this table

recordsFiltered.description: Total number of records after filters have been applied

repo_id.description: The ID of the repository that this plugin is in

key_id.description: The config input base64 encoded key (used for linking keys containing spaces, etc.)

key.description: The config input key or name

value.description: The current value of this config input

label.description: The label used to define this config input

select_options.description: Additional options if the input_type is set to 'select'

slider_options.description: Additional options if the input_type is set to 'slider'

display.description: Should the setting input be displayed (visible, hidden)

description.example: Ensure all video streams are encoded with the H264 codec using the h264_nvenc encoder.

repo_name.description: The name of the repository that this plugin is in

The ID of the repository that this plugin is in

results.description: List of Plugin Type IDs supported by this installation

description.example: Ensure all video streams are encoded with the H264 codec using the h264_nvenc encoder.

repos_list.description: A list of repost to save

address.description: The address of the remote installation

installation.description: The data from the remote installation

schedule_time.example: The time when the task should be executed on

schedule_worker_count.description: The worker count to set (only valid if schedule_task is count)

locked.description: If the worker group is locked and cannot be deleted

name.description: The name of the worker group

number_of_workers.description: The number of workers in this group

worker_event_schedules.description: Any scheduled evenets for this worker group

tags.description: A list of tags associated with this worker

id.description: The ID of the table item

uuid.description: The uuid of the remote installation

link_config.description: The configuration for the remote installation link

distributed_worker_count_target.description: The target count of workers to be distributed across any configured linked installations

locked.description: If the library is locked and cannot be deleted

enable_remote_only.description: If the library is configured for remote files only

enable_scanner.description: If the library is configured to execute library scans

enable_inotify.description: If the library is configured to monitor for file changes

tags.description: A list of tags associated with this library

enabled_plugins.name: Notify Plex

worker_log_tail.description: The log lines produced by the worker

No Plugin requested to run commands for this file '/tmp/unmanic/unmanic_remote_pending_library-1635746225.3336523/file.mp4'
